title: Problem when logging on the website and the client
body:
Hello, I have a problem, my account in the LAN SERVER does not open either on the client or on the web page

Can help me to solve that problem and change the password thinking it was that and verify my username but not let me start

I of Venezuela xD

replies.body: My invocator name in LAN is Effectz10

I wasn't able to find your LAN account without the summoner name, but if your having problems getting logged in our account agents would be able to help out! Reach out to them using this [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and let them know you're having problems getting signed in.
